channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3989] Cookie // Shopsettings
item.description:
Das Cookie mit den Einstellungen (u.a. auch die Sprache) sieht seit heute morgen anders aus:

Alt:
_fit_1="shopSettings#test.distrelec.at/1400515200/0/0#/#channel:B2B,language:de,currency:EUR,country:AT,cookieMessageConfirmed:true"; expires=Mon, 19 May 2014 16:01:54 GMT; path=/; domain=local.sevenval-fit.com

Neu:
_fit_1="shopSettings#test.distrelec.ch/1400570813/0/0#/#channel:B2C,language:de,country:CH,cookieMessageConfirmed:true"; expires=Tue, 20 May 2014 07:27:02 GMT; path=/; domain=m.test.distrelec.ch

Somit funktionieren Mobile die Übersetzungen nicht mehr, da die Sprache nicht mehr nach der alten Logik auslesbar ist. Aktuell bauen wir Mobile gerade um, damit mit beiden Werten umgegangen werden kann.

Wichtig zu wissen wäre aber trotzedem - Ist diese Aenderung gewollt und wird so bleiben?
item.environment: HP-Q // B2B, B2C // CH, AT, IT, LT

comments.comment:
Ist das ein Rätsel, wer findet den Unterschied?

Ich sehe ihn nicht!
sorry rene, habs nun etwas hervorgehoben. -> currency wird nicht mehr mitgegeben, ist das so gewollt?
Yes this correct. The currency is not longer part of the cookie.

PLease take a look

links on this page do not work:

http://test.distrelec.lt/register
Actually applies to all countries on HP Q, including CH, IT, AT
Has already been fixed for v1.1. Needs to be merged to v2.0.
Merged to v2.0 branch. Will be available in v2.0.m6
Verified on HP-Q.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3898] IF-08 CreateContact - Function code not present in SAP
item.description:
In the Quality System at the moment we are not able to create any contact.

Every function defined in the specification seems not found in SAP when we are creating contacts.

Here the specified functions:
https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistFunction

When we create the contact we get this error in the web service:

Mapping in SAP table :ZDGTT_HYBRISERR  is missing</faultName><faultText>SAP ERR:00,058 :Entry 03   does not exist in TPFK (check entry)

In the attachment the request and the response
item.summary: IF-08 CreateContact - Function code not present in SAP

comments.comment:
There is no one to one mapping with the Elfa values. Can we use the below list for Elfa?
AD Administration
CD Constructor/designer
CE Component engineer
DM Departmental Mgr
EM Environmental Mgr
ET Engineer/technician
FI Finance
LM Logistics Mgr
MA Management
PM Purchasing Mgr
PR Project Mgr
PU Purchaser
QA Quality assurance
SA Sales/marketing
SE Self-employed person
SM Service/maint. Mgr

• Could go live without resolving this, however this means that the function would not be sent to SAP
  • Lists between hybris and ELFA SAP needs to be harmonized
    -> Mapping of functions needs to be done
    -> Decision on which functions to be used needs to be taken

Evangelos,

to our knowledge the list of Functions currently in place in hybris is based on New SAP. If that is correct, shouldn't New SAP and ELFA SAP be harmonized in this regard?

Hello Nando,
The two SAP systems are not harmonized and this field is not of a big importance. I discussed with business but we have more important topics to solve at the moment.
The easiest that I see from my side, if you ask me is to turn it to text field and I will direct this information to a text field and not to a list field.
If Oana could approach someone from the busines to do the mapping then I could maintain it accordingly

Ok so the situation is

  • This issue probably concerns not only Function but also Department
  • As a requirement for New SAP requested last year, this was deliberately switched from a text field to a list in hybris
  • Unless the requirements for New SAP have also changed:
    • Seeing and agreeing on the low importance of this, we suggest keeping it as it is on hybris side (store the list values), and just not send them in the interfaces to Elfa SAP.
    • That way nothing needs to be changed for New SAP, and the data will be present in hybris to export it there in R3.

Egangelos, is it correct that the lists and values are fine the way it is now for New SAP?

Hello Nando,
They way there are now are perfect. The department field in elfa is not used at all.
As you mentioned the initial Webshop design was to have it in text.
Whatever changes we do for Elfa will be valid also for the NEW SAP.
So as you said the options are two:
1. We skip these two fields for the Elfa Webshop.
2. We use both of them as free texts of 40 characters and that will be valid both for Elfa and New SAP.

The values we have agreed for the new SAP are still valid.

Ok, thanks for the info.

Discussed with Florian, we are going to do approach 1: skip these two fields for the ELFA Webshop.

  • The fields should be stored in hybris only, not be sent to elfa over the IF
  • The info should be retrieved from hybris instead of SAP when loading user data

Francesco, can you please implement this change?
The current version is already not sending these values for ELFA.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4019] LT - not possible to download cart content
item.description:
Windows 7 Professional, Service Pack 1
IE 11.0.9600.17041

http://test.distrelec.lt/cart

http://test.distrelec.lt/cart/download/xls/

Logged out, add an article to the cart, go to cart, click on the download icon, choose save as xls or save as csv. Both will end as 500 error. (img_60/61_pzu_lt)
item.summary: LT - not possible to download cart content

comments.comment:
Hello,

This error is a null pointer (foreach on a null value). I have added a check before using it.
I have also added the pickup point warehouses to get the same availability than on the product page in the export files.

Laurent

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4007] Cart // recalculation issue
item.description:
1. Put a product form product-detail-page 3 times to the cart.
  2. Go to cart, remove it.
  3. Recalculate layer appears, reloads and then the first sum is still present.

comments.comment:
the issue was caused because the custom specific attributes defined on the cart (AbstractOrderModel) were not cleaned in case of an empty cart.
The issue is now fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3972] Endless creating of order number
item.description: After placing the order I'm endless waiting on the creation of the order number.

comments.comment:
Hi Erik

could you please verify on the frontend side what's happening?
After creating an order i did a ajax call to the url:
https://test.distrelec.lt/checkout/orderConfirmation/checkErpCode?code=00003MFD

And i got the successful response with erp order id code:

"

{\"status\":\"ok\",\"erpCode\":\"0073634373\"}

"
I did a last-minute change before checking in the code on Friday, and (of course) got a cut-and-paste error. Corrected and checked in to SVN now.

there is a javascript error when the page is loading the order code.
Please see the screenshoot.

I got this error in my local environment.
There might have been a timing problem. Changed event hook from onReady to onLoad to avoid this. Code checked in to SVN.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3938] LT - No price info for user with rebate model
item.description:
Windows 7 Enterprise
IE 9.0.8112.16421

http://test.a.distrelec.lt/lt/Cable-plug%2C-713-series-4-pole-Pole-no-4-Binder-99-0429-314-04/p/14476035

User: distrelec.testing+8@gmail.com, pw: distrelec, Article: 147526.

Log in as mentioned user. On article detail page the column "Your Price" is missing. (img_19_pzu_lt)
item.summary: LT - No price info for user with rebate model

comments.comment:
LT / all elfa shops are based on ELFA SAP, including prices / rebate models.
The Movex rebate models have no connection at all to the LT shop.

To verify customer-specific prices, validate it against SAP. Please approach Florian for support.

Regarding SAP the user on this user should be defined a rebate model including a 5% discount.
It seems to be a problem here.

The special prices for this customer are now shown because this customer is not configured in sap to receive online prices.
This informations come from SAP during the customer login in the webshop, with IF-08 ReadCustomer.
Attached there are request and response for 0001254225 customer (distrelec.testing+8@gmail.com).
As you can see in the response:

<onlinePriceCalculation>false</onlinePriceCalculation>

The special price for this customer will the only price that is visible in the product detail page.
This because the scales that are defined in ERP could be different from the scales defined in the list prices.

For that reason in case the user has special prices, these prices will substitute the list prices in the frontend.

Prices are not substituted.

Check this two products:

http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Non-contact-voltage-tester-Fluke-FLK2AC-200-1000VCL/p/17644571?q=*&filter_Category4=Bekontak%C4%8Diai+%C4%AFtampos+testeriai&filter_Buyable=1&page=9&origPageSize=10&simi=99.8

http://test.distrelec.lt/lt/Diode-array-2-Diodes-3-Pins-Common-anode-2000-mA-Diotec-DAP208/p/17002437

If you are logged in as customer 8 (distrelec.testing+lt8@gmail.com, pw: distrelec) or if you are logged out, the prices will not change.

BR, Patrick

This happens because in SAP the company 0001254247 (the contact distrelec.testing+lt8@gmail.com is part of that company) is configured to NOT receive online prices when navigating the ProductDetail page.

This behavior is caused by the IF-08 ReadCustomer (see attachment request_response02.xml).
The interesting line is the following in the response:

<onlinePriceCalculation>false</onlinePriceCalculation>

Until this flag is set to false, the customer will still see the list prices in product detail page.

@Evangelos: do you confirm that for the customer 0001254247 there is no rebate model defined in SAP?

Hello Francesco,
Florian asked me to assign 5% discount to this customer and I did so.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3907] LT - 500 error after activating account
item.description:
Windows 7 Enterprise
IE 9.0.8112.16421
TS-3.111
TS-3.148

http://test.a.distrelec.lt/register/doubleoptin/activation?token=HtbXZP%2FdkexrJtGrVdL9vpVWfr3HDcKp1P%2BcIYi9%2F7A9oRSVpB2P9gfHAmp3Es9Omfz7Mrg4jzF16nbLdPcZpO7YtZ4TrNGyHZKKdo1fpWsfklnf1E2S09ofqJn3VtBqr2j9BPtMaXChMaqE%2BAIqlUsyJkv9laHKmYSqorcOK68%3D

http://test.a.distrelec.lt/register/doubleoptin/activation?token=TZJ1uHNPfukZatP%2FbvzG%2FNM8sJ58w8XN3j2egH1eC%2Ft9%2F4E9IVioEftqjQebnc9inz%2BNYTWNaztNdALYBVKT4rpnYAoZP7VXAoKXyfM0u4qx5TPLsXG2t6EoDtZ4l3TOA%2FEswyjh03Rx1X3CGa70%2FgZFTSp9M9XDPuq0KTf1wd4%3D

I have created a B2C user: distrelec.testing+97, pw: distrelec. After a click on the activating button in received e-mail an 500 error page opens. But account is created and is possible to log in as the created user. (img3/4_pzu_lt)

comments.comment:
Hello,

During the activation process we are calling the method updatCustomer from the SapCustomerService.
This method is not implemented for the moment and throw NotImplementedException.

The call is done in DefaultDistCustomerAccountService as below :

// Process 602 Login and Password Recovery
try {
  getErpCustomerService().updateCustomer(getB2bUnitService().getParent((B2BCustomerModel) customer));
} catch (final UnsupportedOperationException uoex) {
  LOG.debug(uoex.getMessage());
}

What should we do in this method? is it needed or should we removed it from the interface?

Thank you,

Laurent

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3889] IT: B2B-Registration // Variable displayed instead of email on confirmation.
item.description: Instead of the email address of the customer, a variable is displayed. See attached screenshot.
item.summary: IT: B2B-Registration // Variable displayed instead of email on confirmation.

comments.comment: Seems to apply only to IT / in CH it is fine

It comes because we use the apostroph in the property (not visible in your screenshot):

register.successConfirmationEmailText = Un'email Le è stata inviata al seguente indirizzo di posta elettronica: <b>{0}</b>

Instead of using the apostroph I used the unicode : 

register.successConfirmationEmailText = Un\u2019email Le \u00E8 stata inviata al seguente indirizzo di posta elettronica: <b>{0}</b>

Should I replace it for all it properties?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3867] Browser-Caching nutzen
item.description:
Browser-Caching nutzen
Das Festlegen eines Ablaufdatums oder eines Höchstalters in den HTTP-Headern für statische Ressourcen weist den Browser an, zuvor heruntergeladene Ressourcen über die lokale Festplatte anstatt über das Netzwerk zu laden.

Nutzen Sie Browser-Caching für die folgenden cachefähigen Ressourcen:

http://www.distrelec.ch/…mages/landscape_medium/27/4f/950274f.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…ape_medium/59/8f/microsoft-269-16150.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…_e/ps/crealogix-g75_wv-7640110955123.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…cape_medium/_t/if/multi-contact-ls-4.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…f/profilgehause-clamshell-alustyle-6.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…turer_logo/54/08/raspberry_logo_cmyk.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…turer_logo/_e/ps/crealogix_logo_cmyk.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…cturer_logo/_t/if/ebmpapst_logo_cmyk.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…rer_logo/_t/if/microsoft_logo_bitmap.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…r_logo/_t/if/multi_contact_logo_cmyk.jpg (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base-head.min.js (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base-one.min.css (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base-two.min.css (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base.min.js (Ablaufdatum nicht festgelegt)

http://www.distrelec.ch/…all/cache/dyn-jquery-caroufredsel.min.js (Ablaufdatum nicht

comments.comment:
CMS Bilder

Ablaufdatum kann auf unendlich gesetzt werden,
da neue Bilder einen neuen Key bekommen.

-> Aufwand für die Apache config ca. 2h

PIM/Produkt Bilder

Ablaufdatum muss von Distrelec definiert werden.

-> Aufwand für die Apache config ca. 2h

CSS / JavaScript

Damit wir das Ablaufdatum möglichst hoch machen können müssen wir beim Deployment einen Key generieren und ihn als parameter an die CSS-/JS- Dateien anhängen.

Dann können wir das Ablaufdatum auf unendlich einstellen und haben trotzdem nach jedem Deployment sofrt die neusten Files.

-> Aufwand für (generieren, anpassen im Template, Apache config) ca. 10h

@Florian

  • Bitte Ablaufdatum für Bilder vom PIM definieren.
  • Bitte weiteres Vorgehen festlegen.

René,
could you please start with this task.

Can we quickly talk about the expire date?

Einstellungen:

  • default -> 1 Woche
  • PIM-Bilder -> 1 Woche
  • CSS/JS (base*) -> 1 Jahr (sie bekommen neu bei jedem Deployment einen neuen GET-Parameter und werden dann sofort neu geladen)
  • /media -> 1 Jahr (neue Media bekommen immer auch einen neuen Key)

<Location /Web>
ExpiresDefault "access plus 1 month"
</Location>

<Location /_ui/all/cache/>
ExpiresDefault "access plus 1 year"
</Location>

<Location /media>
ExpiresDefault "access plus 1 year"
</Location>
done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3815] Add response time to apache access logs
item.summary: Add response time to apache access logs

comments.comment:
Hello Florian

Please decide if we can do that.

Estimation: 3h
Please start with this task

LogFormat "%h %l %u %t \"%{Host}i\" \"%r\" %>s %b  \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\" %D" custom
 %D  The time taken to serve the request, in microseconds.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3814] Deliver CMS-images directly from apache
item.description:
RewriteEngine On
RewriteRule ^/medias/sys_master/images/([0-9]+)/(.*)(\.jpg|\.png) /medias/sys_master/images/$1$3 [R]

Alias /medias/sys_master/images/ “/xxx/sys_master/images/"
<Directory /xxx/sys_master/images>
Options Indexes FollowSymLinks MultiViews
AllowOverride None
Order allow,deny
allow from all
</Directory>

comments.comment:
Hello Florian

Please decide if we can do that.

Estimation: 3h
Please start with this task
http://test.distrelec.at/medias/sys_master/hba/h31/8860934668318/fluke_vt04_atde_14_HT.png

+       # deliver cms media directly from apache
+       RewriteEngine On
+       RewriteRule ^/medias/sys_master/(.*)/(.*)/(.*)/(.*)(\.gif|\.jpg|\.js|\.pdf|\.png) http://localhost/medias/sys_master/$1/$2/$3$5 [P,NS] 
+       Alias /medias/sys_master /data_nfs/env-q/hybris/data/media/sys_master
+       
+       

+       ProxyPass                               /medias/sys_master              !

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3792] FE: Loading order number on order confirmation page
item.description:
Please add the loading wheel according to the screenshots during the call to SAP to get a order confirmation number.

1. If the loading time is < 10 seconds show the confirmation message and the "return to store" button

"Order number:
XXXXXXXX
Please note this number and include it in any communication with Distrelec regarding this order."

2. If the loading time is > 10 seconds show an error message

"We are not able to generate your order confirmation number at the moment.
You'll find it on this specific order in your <a href="...">order history</a>"

If you need some help please call our back office: +41 123 45 67"
item.summary: FE: Loading order number on order confirmation page

comments.comment: Francesco will implement a controller method which can be used by an AJAX call.
Front end functionality done.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3739] Order of content of the product information accordion
item.description:
Please configure the order of the content in the product information accordion as followed:
1.Beschreibung (hier stehen zahlreiche wichtige Informationen, wie zB. Funktionen des Produkts, die die technischen Daten ergänzen)
2.Hinweise: Bestell- und Lieferhinweise (wichtige Hinweise, wie z.B. dass zu einem kompletten Produkt weitere Elemente separat bestellt werden müssen!)
3.Seitenzahl (Wäre jedoch – auch optisch - wesentlich besser und deutlicher neben der Typenbezeichnung aufgehoben - siehe Bild mit Vorschlag)
4.Umweltdaten
5.Zusätzliche Informationen (Ursprungsland)
item.summary: Order of content of the product information accordion

comments.comment:
Hello,

As discussed with you this morning, this is the new order :

  1. NOTES
  2. FAMILY INFORMATION
  3. ARTICLE INFORMATION
  4. ENVIRONMENTAL INFORMATION
  5. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3731] Cooky Info: wrong placement on smaller screens
item.description:
On smaller screens, the yellow cooke info / acceptance bar is misplaced.

  • It is very close to the support / feedback tabs on a large screen
  • If you resize the window, the cookie info keeps its absolute distance from the right browser edge
  • thus on a 1280 screen, it is actually cut off on the left

Desired behavior:

  • fixed relative to support / feedback links
  • as per styleguide attached
item.summary: Cooky Info: wrong placement on smaller screens

comments.comment: Should be always placed besides the support/Feedback tabs.
Style sheet file "cookie-notice.less" updated.

item.description:
Adaptation to CoOrderSummaryCostCenterBox (ELFA_C156)
as per spec listed in main ticket

comments.comment:
Hello,

Translations to do :

checkoutordersummarycostcenterbox.label : You can add an internal reference text/number to this order to help internal processes.<br>Distrelec will not use this reference.
checkoutordersummarycostcenterbox.costCenter : Your order reference (optional)

I think we should also change the title :

checkoutordersummarycostcenterbox.title : Cost Center and Project Number

After the morning build initialize, I will update the "order history part"

Order history not available for the moment.
Ticket for Lodestone : DISTRELEC-3828
Done. I have open a jira task for the properties translation (DISTRELEC-3847).

ProjectID vs. CostCenter
Now, the wrong field has been renamed... and the wrong field is hidden

Regarding: https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/E130+Order+Review+Page

  • Rename the field "Project ID" to the name "Your Reference" in all webshops, Movex shops included
  • cost center ID field not to be shown in elfa shops

Please update.

Sorry for this.
I have changed the checkout-review-section.jsp and checkout-order-summary-cost-center-box-readonly.jsp
Now we doesn't display the cost center part and we display the project id part renamed in Your Reference.

The property checkoutordersummarycostcenterbox.costCenter has not to be changed anymore.

The property below has been changed to (lt)Your Reference and should be translated.

checkoutordersummarycostcenterbox.projectNumber : (lt)Your Reference

The properties below should be reviewed and translated

checkoutordersummarycostcenterbox.title :  Išlaidų centro ir projekto numeris

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3243] CatalogPlus Detailpage modifications
item.description:
Please modify the following points on the detailpage:

  • Breadcrumb: From home/shortdescription to home/service+/shortdescription
  • URL: catplus to serviceplus
  • Item number: ArtNr. to Type
  • Screenshot 1: Layout issue
  • Screenshot 2: The accordeons "Downloads" and "product information" are not working in Chrome

comments.comment:
Hi Florian,

Breadcrumb and Url need to be adjusted by a Backend Engineer. I will assign the ticket to a BE afterwards.

I changed the label to be "type".

Could you please provide me a link to a page where I can see the layout issues and the accordeon bug? Thanks
Jan

http://test.a.distrelec.ch/en/Abgleichschraubendreher%2C-1-154-Bernstein---1-154/p/service+/90018039

You have to be logged in as B2B

Layout bugs (Catalog Plus item, Availability) and accordeon bug were caused by Francesco Bersani.
For Catplus and Availability, a wrong positioning was set. Also javascript call for getting the availability was sent, which is not needed on the catalog plus page. That caused a js exception and the accordeon did not work anymore.....

Bugs are fixed now.

Hi Pascal,

Could you pleas fix the breadcrumb and url issues. thanks

please define which page is linked behind the new breadcrumb entry.

and what is the url .../service+/... or .../serviceplus/...? it's not clear in the spec above.
Service+

??? is this the site? is this the url param? if yes is it really a upper "S"?

1) Which Page is linked behind the new breadcrumb entry?
2) What's the exact URL Parameter (upper-/lower-case)?

1)
Breadcrumb:
Home / Service+ / Abgleichschraubendreher, 1-154

2)
URL:
http://

{domain}

/

{language}

/p/service+/

{catalogplus item type}

FE tasks: Done
url change to .../service+/...: already done by Nabil

the only thing which is open, is the bread crumb entry. And there, I need to know, what is linked behind the new entry "Service+"?

Will we have a problem if we define a static site (CMS page)?
Is it possible to dynamically put in a content page (per country)?
Otherwise do not defne a link (leave empty).

ok it's now maintainable via properties per cms site id

I've added following properties:
breadcrumb.catalogPlus.link.distrelec_AT=
breadcrumb.catalogPlus.link.distrelec_CH=
breadcrumb.catalogPlus.link.distrelec_IT=

so if you want to link the "Service+" breadcrumb entry for CH to the faq page, you have to change the property to "breadcrumb.catalogPlus.link.distrelec_CH=/cms/faq"

@Pascal: What about moving this config params to the global common local.poperties (/environment/common/hybris/config/local.properties)? I think there will be no difference between the environments - do you?

OK
1) Breadcrumb: From home/shortdescription to home/service+/shortdescription => OK
2) URL: catplus to serviceplus => OK
3) Item number: ArtNr. to Type => OK

Not OK
4) The accordeons "Downloads" and "product information" are not working in Chrome
=> The element "product information" is showing even if there is no info, e.g. on http://test.distrelec.ch/en/Abgleichschraubendreher-Satz%2C-7-teilig%2C-1-150-Bernstein---1-150/p/serviceplus/90206000
Hi! what is the status of thicket? can it be closed?

Hi Oana

Not yet, sorry.
Waiting for Francesco to provide Service+ Mock Data for local testing - or Service+ Product Import on Dev System.

Hi Dominic
to have some test product in you local system you have to:

1 import the impex file attached: catalogPlusImportPreparation.impex
2) place the file catplus_product-WG_wagner_grimm_CH-20140116132800000.csv in the following path:
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\catplus
3) place the attached file catplus_product-WG_wagner_grimm_CH-20140116132800000.end in the same path:
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\catplus

This will start the import of a small set of catalog plus product for Wagner Grimm manufacturer.

Please let me know if you have issues.

4) The accordeons are Working in chrome. The Problem with displaying an empty product information accordeon is, that within this product information accordeon, more than 20 different product properties are displayed and so I would need to test for EVERY of those properties if its empty..that would result in one big if statement. Should I really do that? How often is it the case, that there is really no product information at all?

Discussed with Florian:

  • Service + items never habe product information
  • Hence we can hide the accordion element "Product Information" on all Service + articles without checking any of the properties for not being empty.
Fixed. Can be tested after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2549] Optimize browser caching
item.description:
Reduce if-modified requests using the max-age directive.

e.g. the following resources delivered by Apache

  • http://test.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base-one.css
  • http://test.distrelec.ch/_ui/all/cache/base-head.js
  • http://test.distrelec.ch/Web/WebShopImages/landscape_large/_e/ps/devolo-1236-4250059612365.jpg

e.g. the following resources delivered by Tomcat

  • http://test.distrelec.ch/medias/sys_master/h01/h0a/8796176941086/distrelec_logo.png
  • http://test.distrelec.ch/medias/sys_master/h07/h0a/8796177137694/logo-ehi.png

Consider the option to deliver /medias/... by Apache directly, too.

comments.comment:
done

see: DISTRELEC-3867

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2463] Optimize region cache
item.description:
During the load tests the overall cache statistics show a hit/ miss rate of 99%. In total this value
is good but still needs to be investigated in more detail detail. Only 68% of all Product data
requests and not a single PriceRow request were answered by the cache. The standard cache sizes
have not been changed although the cache size is not constrained as Distrelec has licensed the
hybris High Performance option.

Recommendation: Improve the cache hit/miss ration by changing its parameters,
e.g. size or eviction strategies.
see https://wiki.hybris.com/display/release4/Region+Cache

comments.comment: We wait for experience with CH traffic before increasing cache from 100'000 to 300'000 entries.

Adrian,
do we have first conclusions from CH traffic analysis?

Increasing the cache size does currently not make much sense. With 100'000 items we reach a hit ratio of about 95%. After increasing cache size to 300'000 items the hit ratio increased only little to 96%. However, we have to find out why certain items are rather being cached. E.g. StockLevel, ProductFeature and DistSalesOrgProduct have a very poor hit ratio.

=> 5% cache misses generate still a big load on the database. Current numbers: 14'637'426 misses during 24h => average 170 sql statements per second (on every server).

1) Change Strategy from FIFO to "last touched"
2) check cache hit ratio
3) increase cache size
4) check

  • memory consumption
  • cache hit ratio
  • average 170 sql statements per second (on every server).
  • would be great to be able to check the load on the DB before and after the change

Before we start optimizing, I checked the cache hit ratio again (01.05.2014). On all nodes 1..4 we have the same ratio values:

  • 99% hit ratio for typesystemCacheRegion
  • 97% hit ratio for entityCacheRegion (100% of cache size used)
  • 95% hit ratio for queryCacheRegion

@Adi

How did you check the values of:

  • statements per second (hmc) ?
  • cache hit ratio (hmc,jconsole) ?

I assume the "memory consumption" will be OK since you already increased to 300000 item in cache.

Did you already change the strategy (FIFO) ?

Thanks
René

@René:

  • Statements per second (just a roughly number) => switch on JDBC logging for 1 min and count lines
  • Cache hit ratio can be found in hAC => http://10.191.20.141:9001/hac/monitoring/cache
  • No, I did not yet change the eviction policy.

I did a short test using 300'000 items. But those days the number of sessions were lower!

My recommendation:

1) Change cache strategy for next deployment.
2) Monitor the system the day after
3) Increase cache for the next deployment
3) Monitor the system the day after

Effort approx. 1PT

@Florian

Bitte das weitere Vorgehen definieren.
Bitte umsetzen.

Changed for R1.1 (to have time to monitor after the deployment) :

regioncache.entityregion.evictionpolicy=LFU
regioncache.querycacheregion.size=40000
Auf Test sind die Anpassung OK!

only the first part is done yet!
-> reopen
No negative impact from changing to LFU!

Checked hit rate again on prod node 1+2:

99% hit ratio for typesystemCacheRegion
97% hit ratio for entityCacheRegion (100% of cache size used)
96% hit ratio for queryCacheRegion

Increased entity cache size to 300000 objects:

regioncache.entityregion.size=300000
done
